title: ISafeArrayUtility.PackVariant
description: Packs the specified native SOLIDWORKS Dispatch-based objects of the same data type into a Variant SafeArray and returns that packed Variant SafeArray to use in methods requiring passing a packed Variant SafeArray.
signature:
void PackVariant( 
   out System.Object
VariantArray
,
   System.Int32
Count
,
   System.Int32
Type
,
   ref System.Int32
Data
)
